1st star: Petr Mrazek
2nd star: Jamie Benn
3rd star: Alex Killorn
               
Notes for Calgary Flames:
-Sean Monahan had his 5 game point streak snapped.

Notes for Dallas Stars:
-Jason Dickinson scored his 10th goal of the season.
-Alex Killorn scored his 20th goal of the season.
-Jamie Benn scored his 30th goal of the season.
-Jason Dickinson finally ended his 11 game goal drought.

-Hunter Shinkaruk fought Adam Erne in a fight.
-Jordan Nolan beat Artem Anisimov in a fight.
-Dion Phaneuf beat Alexander Radulov in a fight.
-Alex Petrovic fought Mark Pysyk in a fight.
-Petr Mrazek beat Blake Pietila in a fight.
